titlestmt.titleproper:
Levi's in America: A Portfolio by Bert Stern
1971, 1973
PR 406
titlestmt.author: Larry Weimer

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 15:50:44 -0400.

did.unittitle: Levi's in America: a portfolio by Bert Stern
did.abstract:
A portfolio of 9 lithographs, 3 silkscreens, introductory text, and other front matter, in a case. Commissioned by Hystron Fibers Incorporated, Stern's portfolio includes imagery centered on the advertising, fashion, and history of Levi Strauss jeans. This copy is number 43 of 300 of Edition A, in which all 9 prints are signed and numbered by Stern. This copy is inscribed by Stern to the photographer Jessica Burstein, who donated it to New-York Historical.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Levi's in America: a portfolio by Bert Stern
